task.title: Use Grip Rotate Function on Dynamic Blocks
task.shortdesc: You can rotate the selected entity by dragging its rotation grip.

context.p: Once you have selected a dynamic block contains rotate action, click the light blue rotate grip on the dynamic block to display command line prompt as follows:
Rotate dynamic block by using grip

step.cmd: Select the dynamic block contains move action.
Clickon the light blue grip of the dynamic blockto highlight the selected grip.
Command line prompt appears, do either of the following:
Specify "B(Base point)" option to locate the base point for rotating.
Specify "U(Undo)" option to abort last rotation.
Specify "X(eXit)" option to exit rotate manipulation.
After specifying the rotation angle, the entity will be rotated centered by the selected grip (or the new base point).
